name: solar system (itch) (francisTriesItch)
description:
My first unity app! Submitted in partial fulfillment for Michigan State University's specialization course in Game Development. 

Required Screenshots:

Hierarchy be looking clean af~

Project folder be fresh as heck, no cap~

I added Mars, Venus, Jupiter and Mercury for the project. Changed FOV, added another comet spawner using a different Z angle to add some effect. Changed its spawn point too. Oh and the added planets have sounds (gathered from freesound.org of course) and includes texture from the base archive. I only included 2 platforms for this one - webGL and windows. For some reason, my hub wont let me install mac OS and iOS modules. Will figure it out soon! 

Would also like to say Hi to my classmates, super exciting days ahead~ Though I have spent more time actually trying to make unity work rather than the game development... I think it'll get a lot better. Cheers!

Made by Francis S.

Do follow me here or message me if you're taking the course as well! Would love to have you as contacts! Let's work on the course together :)
